text:
="preserve">Francisco Daniel Rivera Sánchez (15 October 1955 – 18 January 2021) was a Mexican Roman Catholic auxiliary bishop. Rivera Sánchez was born in Guadalajara, Jalisco. He became a priest in 1988. He was titular bishop of "Aradi" and auxiliary bishop of the Roman Catholic Archdiocese of Mexico City from 2020 until his death in 2021.
Rivera Sánchez died on 18 January 2021 from COVID-19 during the COVID-19 pandemic in Mexico, aged 65.

annotations.surface_form: Roman Catholic Archdiocese of Mexico City
